capstone.gui.utils

Class SequencerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • capstone.gui.utils.SequencerUtils

  • public class SequencerUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that keeps general information about the sequence, as well as static utility or convenience methods.

      • loadFile

        public static void loadFile(SequencerDisplay display,
                            NoteCollection notes,
                            java.lang.String filename)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Helper method to aid in loading an existing data file.
        Parameters:
        display - SequencerDisplay object to use as a parent reference.
        notes - NoteCollection to load values for each Note into.
        filename - data filename to which to load data from.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the file does not exist.
